SEARCH
Package model

Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract base class for a user in the Hospital Management System (HMS). Provides core user attributes and functionalities such as password management, messaging, and role-based access. Serves as a base class for specific user types.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String id, String name, String role)
      Constructs a User with the specified ID, name, and role. The user is initialized with a default password, an unlocked account, and first login status set to true.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the user.
      name - The name of the user.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., "Patient", "Doctor").

    • User

      public User(String id, String name, String password, String role)
      Constructs a User with the specified ID, name, password, and role. This constructor calls the main constructor and then sets the provided password.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the user.
      name - The name of the user.
      password - The password for the user.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., "Patient", "Doctor").

  • Method Details

    • displayUserInfo

      public void displayUserInfo()
      Displays basic user information, including their ID and role.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the user.
      Returns:
      The name of the user.

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked()
      Checks if the user's account is locked.
      Returns:
      true if the account is locked, false otherwise.

    • setLocked

      public void setLocked(boolean locked)
      Locks or unlocks the user's account.
      Parameters:
      locked - true to lock the account, false to unlock it.

    • getUnreadIndex

      public int getUnreadIndex()
      Retrieves the index of the first unread message in the user's message list.
      Returns:
      The index of the first unread message.

    • setUnreadIndex

      public void setUnreadIndex(int i)
      Sets the index of the first unread message.
      Parameters:
      i - The new unread index.

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Retrieves the role of the user.
      Returns:
      The role of the user.

    • getID

      public String getID()
      Retrieves the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The unique ID of the user.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String newPassword)
      Sets a new password for the user.
      Parameters:
      newPassword - The new password.

    • isFirstLogin

      public boolean isFirstLogin()
      Checks if this is the user's first login.
      Returns:
      true if this is the first login, false otherwise.

    • setFirstLogin

      public void setFirstLogin(boolean isFirstLogin)
      Updates the first login status for the user.
      Parameters:
      isFirstLogin - true to indicate this is the first login, false otherwise.

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      Retrieves the user's password.
      Returns:
      The password of the user.

    • getMessages

      public ArrayList<String> getMessages()
      Retrieves the list of messages associated with the user.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of messages.

    • createController

      public abstract SessionController createController(Scanner scanner)
      Creates a session controller for the user. This method is abstract and must be implemented by subclasses to provide role-specific functionality.
      Parameters:
      scanner - A Scanner instance for user input.
      Returns:
      A SessionController for managing the user's session.

    • unLock

      public void unLock()
      Unlocks the user's account.
